text:
Wow. Schefter just surmised on ESPN that one reason the Eagles may have taken Jalen Hurts is because COVID-19 makes backup QBs more important than ever.

“Coronavirus is out there. What if your quarterback gets the virus?”

Seems like a draft weekend reach to me.
